text: Lärbro is a locality in Gotland Municipality in Gotland County in Sweden. In 2010, 484 people lived there. It is located in the north approximately away from Slite. The place had train connection with Visby between 1921 and 1960. One sight of the place is the medieval Lärbro Church.. == References == Category:Settlements in Gotland County
title: Lärbro
